item.title: Building an AI-Optimized Blog with Hugo: A Complete DevOps Journey
item.description: A complete, real-world walkthrough of setting up a Hugo blog optimized for AI discovery, with automated deployment, health monitoring, and SEO optimization. Including every step, challenge, and solution.
